attributes.additional_details:
Our local councillors will do nothing in the subject of speeding and we all presume that it will take someone to get killed before anything gets done which is too late! 
They say the roads aren’t big enough with is absolute nonsense as the next village along being Thorpe salvin has even small roads but still have speed humps. 
We had a vehicle crash last night because the driver was travelling at around 50mph.
attributes.background:
Shireoaks is a small village in Nottinghamshire and speeding is a major issue in our village. 
It’s a 30mph limit but nothing gets done in regards to speeding measures. Every single day do people come through our village going in excess of 40-50mph.

rejection.details:
You could raise this issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition your local council directly. Find out how to petition your council here: https://www.nottinghamshire.gov.uk/council-and-democracy/get-involved/petitions
